response: "{ \"title\": \"Max Sum of Subarray\", \"description\": \"Given an array of integers, find the maximum sum of a subarray. A subarray is a contiguous part of the array.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): An array of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of a subarray.\\n\", \"code\": \"def max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n    if len(arr) == 0:\\n        return 0\\n    max_sum = arr[0]\\n    current_sum = arr[0]\\n    for num in arr[1:]:\\n        current_sum = max(num, current_sum + num)\\n        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)\\n    return max_sum\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_subarray([-2, 1, -3, 4, -1, 2, 1, -5, 4]) == 6\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([0]) == 0\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([]) == 0\"] }"
